channel.title: Homepage of Yimin Wang
channel.description: Recent content on Homepage of Yimin Wang

item.title: Binocular Encoding in the Damselfly Pre-motor Target Tracking System
TeraVR Empowers Precise Reconstruction of Complete 3-D Neuronal Morphology in the Whole Brain
Automatic Neuron Reconstruction
item.description: Reconstructing neuronal morphologies from whole-brain imaging data using automatic algorithms.

item.title: Immersive Visualization of Brain Image Big Data
Neuron Morphology Generation
item.description: Generating authentic neuron morphologies using deep learning.

item.title: Complete single neuron reconstruction reveals morphological diversity in molecularly defined claustral and cortical neuron types
Auto Focus Device And Method For Liquid Crystal Display
Producing Sounds In A Virtual World And Related Sound Card
Managing software performance tests based on a distributed virtual machine system
Creation of rhythmic password and authentication based on rhythmic password
Method and apparatus for processing three-dimensional model data
Building controllable clairvoyance device in virtual world
Method and apparatus for search in virtual world
Method and system for providing images of a virtual world scene and method and system for processing the same
